entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
